title: Apartment For Rent. 3 Bdrms 2nd Floor
posting_body: ['Yonkers No East.', '$2,700.00.', '  3 Bedroom', 'Welcome home to your lovely 3 Three bedrooms home in the heart of NE Yonkers.', 'This spacious apartment features a huge living room/ dining room open concept, ample bedroom space, a renovated kitchen and elegant wood floors; additional two parking spaces driveway 0.00.', 'Convenient to public transportation, highways, stores, and restaurants, this home is perfect for comfort and style.', 'Broker Fee  Security  Rent', 'Proof of Income', 'Bad Low Credit Welcome)', '35x monthly rent $94,500+', 'W2 4 Recents Paystubs References', 'Broker Fee Security Rent', 'David Castro 914-512-8057', 'Call NYS Licensed Real Estate Broker', 'Grand Lux Realty Cerrone Realtors', 'Office  914-693-1600']
